question: What is the negative effect of "hot spots" forming on the filament?
answer: a variation of diameter of only 1% will cause a 25% reduction in service life
passage: (Incandescent_light_bulb) One of the problems of the standard electric light bulb is filament notching due to evaporation of the filament.
